branchCategory.name: LEYG, Electric Actuator, Guide Rod Type
branchCategory.description: The LEYG guided rod electric actuator pairs an LEY actuator with a bolt-on bearing block with double guide rods. The guide rods counter rotational forces instead of the drive and motor, and also resist shock and sustained lateral loads. Guide blocks can be fitted with either slide or ball bushing bearings.

breadCrumb.name: LEYG, Electric Actuator, Guide Rod Type
